description.value: CTIS is a [primary registry of the World Health Organization](https://www.who.int/clinical-trials-registry-platform/network/primary-registries) (WHO). Data from trials published on this website is included in the search portal of [WHO's International Clinical Trials Registry Platform (ICTRP)](https://trialsearch.who.int/). This applies to relevant clinical trial data, [as required by WHO](https://www.who.int/clinical-trials-registry-platform/network/who-data-set), which has been published on CTIS since the launch of the system on 31 January 2022. For more information, see [https://euclinicaltrials.eu/](https://euclinicaltrials.eu/).
